scripts.start: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && node src/
scripts.testdocker:pre: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && npx jest --watchAll=false --forceExit
scripts.testdocker:unit: npm install && npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && npx jest --watchAll=false --forceExit
scripts.buildfreshdocker: npm install && npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && nodemon src/
scripts.buildfresh: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && node src/
scripts.dev: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && PORT=8080 nodemon src/
scripts.dev-win: npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest && npx knex seed:run && set PORT=8080 && nodemon src/
